class.name: FmodEventEmitter3D
class.brief_description: Emits Fmod Events and places them in the 2d world
class.description: FmodEventEmitter3D can be triggered with signals. Sounds will be played at the emitters transform or it's parents.

method.name: get_parameter
method.description: Gets the value of parameter by name. Returns NAN if parameter does not exist.

method.name: get_parameter_by_id
method.description: Gets the value of parameter by id. returns NAN if parameter does not exist

method.name: set_parameter
method.description: Sets the value of parameter by name. Does nothing if no parameter exists.

method.name: set_parameter_by_id
method.description: Sets the value of parameter by id. Does nothing if no parameter exists.

method.name: start
method.description: starts playing the current event or plays a new oneshot

method.name: stop
method.description: stops playing the last played sound.

members.member: if [code]true[/code] the event instance will attach to the parent rigidbody node.
if [member override_attenuation] is [code]true[/code] sets the event's maximum attenuation distance
if [member override_attenuation] is [code]true[/code] sets the event's minimum attenuation distance
If not [member attached_to_rigidbody] event instance tracks the velocity of the object
If [code]true[/code] events will be played as one shots.
If [code]true[/code] the sound will attenuate with the values of [member attenuation_min] and [member attenuation_max]
if [code]true[/code] sample data will be preloaded
if [code]true[/code] sound can only be played once
